summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene is identified as a specific type of olefin, which is a category of alkenes. The text discusses emissions from facilities that produce various olefins, including Buta-1,3-diene, indicating that it is part of the broader class of alkenes. However, the relationship is primarily categorical, with no detailed interaction or specific functional relevance provided between Buta-1,3-diene and alkenes beyond their classification.
